Title: New Wave - NW-22 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The Momeni New Wave - NW-22 Area Rug is a piece of floor art that will instantly elevate the appearance of any modern living space. Inspired by popular works of twentieth-century art, this dynamic design element will create an eye-catching focal point when added to your existing décor.

  • The bold pattern pairs angular shapes with contrasting colors to create a piece of décor that is both abstract and artistic.
  • To create an unforgettably luxurious experience, pure wool fibers have hand-tufted to increase softness.
  • Using a canister vacuum once a week is recommended. Avoid the use of the vacuum's beater brush when caring for this piece.
  • Made in India.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: New Wave - NW-146 Area Rug

Title: Anatolia - ANA-10 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Drawing inspiration from rich textile tradition from around the world, the Anatolia collection embraces a global outlook to infuse every home with a touch of adventure. The exquisite ANA-10 area rug boasts intricate detailing with crisp linework throughout – made strong for smart performance in active family settings.

  • Choose from a diverse variety of soft pastel colorways. Each one is easy to coordinate and sure to become a favorite anchor point within your decor theme.
  • Anatolia is a unique traditional area rug that centers around three geometric medallions, a keyed pattern tracing around every edge. Use to complement classic and contemporary themes alike.
  • This blended area rug is made with a combination of soft natural wool and resilient nylon, the yarns worked into a tight looped pile sure to stand up well to heavy foot traffic.
  • Vacuum using suction only, avoiding the use of any type of beater bar component. Invest in professional cleaning as needed.

Title: Bristol - BRS-9 Area Rug

Explore new ways to enjoy classic patterns with the inventive Bristol collection by Momeni. The eye-catching Bristol BRS-9 area rug features a familiar medallion and border pattern, simplified into a refined palette of texture and tone.

  • Each rug in the Bristol collection is carefully handwoven by skilled artisans using a combination of resilient wool and natural cotton. Each end is capped with a breezy fringe. Flexible construction makes these rugs great for layering.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting with the beater bar component disengaged.

  • Immediately blot away spills using a dry white cloth. When vacuuming, use a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment.

Bold patterns meet warm freeform influences with the Willow WLO-1 area rug. This stunning design features a chic mini-check pattern rendered in pure wool for endlessly alluring comfort. This piece is handcrafted from start to finish by the skilled artisans at Momeni.

  • Choose from a variety of earthy colorways, each one wonderfully approachable. These two-tone rugs are easy to coordinate and even easier to appreciate.
  • This contemporary area rug elevates its simple pattern using high-low pile construction. The colorful checks pop against the flatwoven base for texture that you can see and feel. A braided stripe caps each end.
  • Willow collection area rugs are handwoven by skilled Momeni artisans for expressive appeal in every detail. This is a 100% wool rug, made using finespun yarns for an especially soft and comfortable texture.
  • Immediately blot away spills using a dry white cloth. When vacuuming, use a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment.

Title: Willow - WLO-4 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy the timeless appeal of a classic checkerboard pattern with the handsome Willow WLO-04 area rug from Momeni. This exquisitely handcrafted design is made from pure wool for underfoot comfort, offering a flexible and practical way to experiment with bold patterns throughout the home.

  • This flatwoven rug offers a world of placement possibilities to explore. Use on its own or layer with other area rugs. Use to greet guests in a grand entry foyer, to underscore a dining table arrangement, or to tie together a living space.
  • Willow is available in a variety of easy-to-coordinate colorways that lean neutral for adaptable appeal. This geometric area rug would make a fantastic complement for contemporary and traditional interior decor themes alike.
  • Highly skilled artisans weave every Willow collection area rug by hand for a fabulous union between precision and creative expression. The 100% wool rug composition ensures long-lasting charm in any placement.
  • Quickly blot away spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Nirvana - NIR-3 Area Rug

Make an elegant, ornate choice for your stylish home with the Leiden LEI-5 Area Rug by Momeni.

  • This lovely area rug is carefully hand-tufted in India.

  • The low pile, 100% wool area rug is a durable and elevated choice for any room of your well-decorated home.

Title: Riviera - RV-03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Express your love for global art inside or outside of the home with the ultra-versatile Riviera RV-03 area rug by Momeni. This design draws influence from batik textiles, its complex stippled patterns expressed in durable weather-resistant synthetics to suit any of your most hardwearing placements.

  • From its geometric field patterns to the layered borders that cap each end, this dramatic navy rug offers so much to admire with every glance.
  • Use this transitional area rug to bring expressive sophistication to the patio, poolside, sunroom, or demanding indoor spaces like kitchens and dining rooms.
  • This synthetic area rug readily resists staining and fading thanks to its 100% polypropylene composition. Flatwoven construction ensures lightweight handling.
  • Cleanup is easy. Simply spot clean stubborn soil with a solution of natural detergent and cool water as needed.

Title: Tahoe - TA-04 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Boasting a captivating Southwestern style in inviting neutral hues, the Momeni Tahoe TA-04 area rug is sure to catch eyes. Of course, its soft, loop-hooked wool construction is certain to be adored as well..

  • Wool fibers are masterfully loop-hooked by artisans using time-tested methods for ultra-comfort.
  • Inspired by timeless tribal designs, the Southwestern look, inviting tones, and tasseled ends of this piece make it a charming base for any living, dining, or entertaining space.
  • Wool yarns are meticulously loop-hooked by artisans into a high pile height to create our soft area rug.
  • A beater bar is not recommended as it can shorten the lifespan of your area rug.

Title: Desert Gabbeh - DG-04 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Momeni introduces a chic contemporary take on textile tradition with the Desert Gabbeh collection. The beautiful DG-04 area rug boasts breathtakingly vibrant coloration and artfully handcrafted construction, a style-defining accent for any interior.

  • DG-04 is inspired by traditional Gabbeh textiles, a type of Persian carpet known for its thick pile and rich hues - qualities this design captures perfectly.
  • This southwestern rug features bands of gold and red interspersed with warm neutrals for all the drama of a desert landscape, each color made even richer through a subtle variegated yarn effect.
  • Hand-knotted construction brings incomparable artistry to this 100% wool rug design. The plush pile is cut to a manageable height for easier upkeep and care, sure to maintain its charm for years of everyday enjoyment.
  • Expect shedding with any wool area rug. Shedding will subside with regular vacuuming using a low power suction-only setting.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Metro - MT-12 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a bold statement with the completely contemporary Metro MT-12 Area Rug by Momeni.

Title: Veranda - VR-63 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Whether you're landlocked or already live beachside, our Momeni Veranda VR-63 rug brings the coast to you with its fun, birds-eye-view of the shore. Perfect for kids' rooms or patios, this playful piece is loop-hooked of polypropylene for substantial comfort and durability..

  • Inside or out, this rug is meticulously loop-hooked of poly fibers, so it's mildew-resistant, durable, and protected from UV rays.
  • With an aerial view over blue waters and a colorful beach, this fun floor covering lends an imaginative accent to your backyard patio, kid's bedroom, or laundry room.
  • Our loop-hooked rug boasts a high pile of polypropylene, resulting in a comfy surface that's highly resilient.
  • Rotate your rug semi-regularly to distribute foot traffic evenly over the years.

Title: Como - COM-05 Area Rug

  • Como collection rugs are made with weather-resistant materials for resilient placement both indoors and outdoors. Feel confident using this design in your most demanding placements.
  • A wide zig-zag pattern decorates the center of this modern area rug in light grey over deep charcoal. Use to underscore an indoor dining table, to bring together a patio seating area, or to soften your step at the poolside.
  • This 100% polypropylene area rug is machine-made with thick twisted yarns that mimic the look of natural fibers like jute. Como collection area rugs are lightweight and easy to handle, arrange, and maintain.
  • Spot clean using gentle detergent, then rinse clean with cool water.

Title: Simba - SIM-6 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Momeni introduces a soft and luxurious way to enjoy globally-inspired art styles with the endlessly expressive Simba collection. The SIM-6 area rug captures attention with its refined minimalist motifs – rendered with a wavering hand to reflect its handcrafted origin.

Title: Bristol - BRS-8 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Classic patterns are elevated with exquisite texture with the BRS-8 area rug by Momeni. This piece is part of the highly innovative Bristol collection, a series of rugs that combine flatwoven bases with soft pile to create a rich topography sure to turn heads.

  • Durable construction makes Bristol rugs a fantastic selection for active family environments. These rugs are suitable for homes with pets, children, and higher levels of foot traffic.

  • Handwoven construction brings an expressive artisanal element to each Bristol collection rug. The blended rug composition consists of 90% wool interwoven with a hint of soft cotton, comfortable yet resilient. A light fringe caps each end.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Invest in professional cleaning as needed.
